name: Water Balloonz
description:
Summer too hot? Cool off at the beach with Water Balloonz! Use the keyboard, mouse, or joypad to take careful aim, then throw your water balloon over the sand dune to hit your friend. But watch the wind because it changes every turn. Enjoy this kid-friendly clone of the old ASCII game "Artillery"

Features

  • Casual gameplay
  • Control with keyboard, mouse, PlayStation, Xbox, and Nintendo controllers
  • Take turns with a friend (or frenemy)
  • Procedurally generated terrain and variable wind so every round is unique

Credits

Graphics: Kenney.nl

Music: @wyver9, wyver9.bandcamp.com
